channel.title: Science dissolving essay
channel.description:
The question is what happens to the sugar in my tea i know it dissolves and the particles seperate but i need to make it longer al ive got is
IT DISSOLVES!

item.title: Science dissolving essay
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

How long does it take to dissolve sugar in water? Does the rate change depending on whether there is tea dissolved in the water as well? Does the rate change depending on the temperature of the water? Does the rate change if you use something other than water? Does the rate change if you use something other than sugar? What about combinations of the above? What changes the rate more? Why does this happen?

That should get you started, at least.

Read full topic
